Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory18.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'A total wipeout, huh.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Tifa', 3: 'Your turn, Captain?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Nope. No, thanks. We're just temporary acquaintances.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The dark subway station is paved with bodies. Standing in front of a Corrupted, as if mocking it, is a redheaded girl.'}
{3: 'The Corrupted charges towards Vera. The spikes on the ground shoot out like bullets, forcing Vera to back up into a run-down wall.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'I could simply end you here... but I know a better way to torture you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Gray Raven... You'll be perfect for this. Heh.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I'll set you down here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "That ravenling sure is birdbrained, saying that I can have the body right after they're done with their investigation.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Is it out of naivety? Or something ulterior? Well, interesting either way.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera unloads the preservation pod holding the Corrupted Tifa in a corridor. Without a thought to any repercussions, she connects Tifa to power.'}
{3: "With her brain damaged, the only place she can show her bewilderment is through the screen on top of the pod. Tifa's battered form is now no more than a coffin imprisoning her consciousness."}
{3: 'On the screen, Tifa exhibits panic and regret. Through the connection established by Gray Raven, she is forced to remember all that happened between her and her Commandant.'}
{3: 'And understand what she did wrong.'}
{3: "Vera strokes Tifa's cheek, as if comforting her."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1703.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{2: 'Tifa', 3: 'I... I... Just what—'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I know you're crying, Tifa. Now that you've regained your humanity, you can feel pain."}
{2: 'Tifa', 3: 'Commandant... Why... Why do they have a Commandant while my... my Commandant...'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Those who don't feel pain are not actually alive. Without pain, you can't prove that you exist."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'My mission is to kill Tifa. And Tifa, you exist right here, right now.'}
{3: "Vera places a gentle hand on Tifa's cheek comfortingly."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "And that's why I'll give you a way out. Leave all your pain to me—just like how everyone else did."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "That's all I can do for you, Tifa."}
{3: "—And then Vera raises her hand. She punches straight through Tifa's brain and the pod, crushing it all."}
